MAN.TITLE: findfileassociation
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Searches for and retrieves a file association-related string from the registry.(Windows only)

CALLING_SEQUENCE.CALLING_SEQUENCE_ITEM: findfileassociation('A file name extension, such as .txt')

DESCRIPTION.P: findfileassociation('A file name extension, such as .txt') Searches for and retrieves a file association-related string from the registry.
